post.description: Test sample for invoice: { "filename": "mynewfile.txt", "modulepart": "invoice", "ref": "FA1701-001", "subdir": "", "filecontent": "content text", "fileencoding": "", "overwriteifexists": "0" }. Test sample for supplier invoice: { "filename": "mynewfile.txt", "modulepart": "supplier_invoice", "ref": "FA1701-001", "subdir": "", "filecontent": "content text", "fileencoding": "", "overwriteifexists": "0" }. Test sample for medias file: { "filename": "mynewfile.txt", "modulepart": "medias", "ref": "", "subdir": "image/mywebsite", "filecontent": "Y29udGVudCB0ZXh0Cg==", "fileencoding": "base64", "overwriteifexists": "0" }.

get.summary: Login üîì
get.description: Request the API token for a couple username / password. WARNING: You should NEVER use this API, like you should never use the similare API that uses the POST method. This will expose your password. To use the APIs, you should instead set an API token to the user you want to allow to use API (This API token called DOLAPIKEY can be found/set on the user page) and use this token as credential for any API call. From the API explorer, you can enter directly the "DOLAPIKEY" into the field at the top right of the page to get access to any allowed APIs.

post.description: Request the API token for a couple username / password. WARNING: You should NEVER use this API, like you should never use the similare API that uses the POST method. This will expose your password. To use the APIs, you should instead set an API token to the user you want to allow to use API (This API token called DOLAPIKEY can be found/set on the user page) and use this token as credential for any API call. From the API explorer, you can enter directly the "DOLAPIKEY" into the field at the top right of the page to get access to any allowed APIs.

get.summary: Get a list of stock movement üîê

parameters.name: createStockmovementsModel
parameters.description:
**product_id** (required)  
**warehouse_id** (required)  
**qty** (required)  
type  
lot  
movementcode  
movementlabel  
price  
datem  
dlc  
dluo  
origin_type  
origin_id

post.description: You can use the following message to test this RES API: { "product_id": 1, "warehouse_id": 1, "qty": 1, "lot": "", "movementcode": "INV123", "movementlabel": "Inventory 123", "price": 0 } $price Can be set to update AWP (Average Weighted Price) when you make a stock increase $dlc Eat-by date. Will be used if lot does not exists yet and will be created. $dluo Sell-by date. Will be used if lot does not exists yet and will be created.

put.summary: Merge a thirdparty into another one. üîê
put.description: Merge content (properties, notes) and objects (like invoices, events, orders, proposals, ...) of a thirdparty into a target thirdparty, then delete the merged thirdparty. If a property has a defined value both in thirdparty to delete and thirdparty to keep, the value into the thirdparty to delete will be ignored, the value of target thirdparty will remain, except for notes (content is concatenated).

Get a specific gateway attached to a thirdparty (by specifying the site key) üîê

401.description: Unauthorized: User does not have permission to read thirdparties

404.description: Not Found: Specified thirdparty ID does not belongs to an existing thirdparty

post.summary: Create and attach a new gateway to an existing thirdparty üîê
post.description:
Possible fields for request_data (request body) are specified in llx_societe_account table.
See Table llx_societe_account wiki page for more information

Example body payload : 
{"key_account": "cus_DAVkLSs1LYyYI", "site": "stripe"}

401.description: Unauthorized: User does not have permission to read thirdparties

409.description: Conflict: A SocieteAccount entity (gateway) already exists for this company and site.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Error creating SocieteAccount account

delete.summary: Delete all gateways attached to a thirdparty üîê

401.description: Unauthorized: User does not have permission to delete thirdparties gateways

404.description: Not Found: Specified thirdparty ID does not belongs to an existing thirdparty

500.description: Internal Server Error: Error deleting SocieteAccount entity

put.summary: Create and attach a new (or replace an existing) specific site gateway to a thirdparty üîê
put.description:
You MUST pass all values to keep (otherwise, they will be deleted) !
If you just need to update specific fields prefer PATCH /thirdparties/{id}/gateways/{site} endpoint.

When a SocieteAccount entity does not exist for the id and site supplied, a new one will be created. In that case fk_soc and site members form request body payload will be ignored and id and site query strings parameters will be used instead.

401.description: Unauthorized: User does not have permission to read thirdparties

500.description: Internal Server Error: Error updating SocieteAccount entity

patch.summary: Update specified values of a specific gateway attached to a thirdparty üîê

401.description: Unauthorized: User does not have permission to read thirdparties

404.description: Not Found: Specified thirdparty ID does not belongs to an existing thirdparty

409.description: Conflict: Another SocieteAccount entity already exists for this thirdparty with this site key.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Error updating SocieteAccount entity

delete.summary: Delete a specific site gateway attached to a thirdparty (by gateway id) üîê

401.description: Unauthorized: User does not have permission to delete thirdparties gateways

404.description: Not Found: Specified thirdparty ID does not belongs to an existing thirdparty

500.description: Internal Server Error: Error deleting SocieteAccount entity

get.description: Return an array with warehouse informations

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Use this param to filter list by category

parameters.name: sqlfilters
parameters.description: Other criteria to filter answers separated by a comma. Syntax example "(t.label:like:'WH-%') and (t.date_creation:<:'20160101')"

get.summary: List warehouses üîê
get.description: Get a list of warehouses

bankaccount_from_id.description: BankAccount ID to use as the source of the internal wire transfer

bankaccount_to_id.description: BankAccount ID to use as the destination of the internal wire transfer

date.description: Date of the internal wire transfer (UNIX timestamp)

description.description: Description of the internal wire transfer

amount.description: Amount to transfer from the source to the destination BankAccount

amount_to.description: Amount to transfer to the destination BankAccount (only when accounts does not share the same currency)

url_id.description: ID to set in the URL

modulepart.description: Name of module or area concerned by file download ('thirdparty', 'member', 'proposal', 'supplier_proposal', 'order', 'supplier_order', 'invoice', 'supplier_invoice', 'shipment', 'project', ...)

original_file.description: Relative path with filename, relative to modulepart (for example: IN201701-999/IN201701-999.pdf).

doctemplate.description: Set here the doc template to use for document generation (If not set, use the default template).

langcode.description: Language code like 'en_US', 'fr_FR', 'es_ES', ... (If not set, use the default language).

modulepart.description: Name of module or area concerned by file upload ('product', 'service', 'invoice', 'proposal', 'project', 'project_task', 'supplier_invoice', 'expensereport', 'member', ...)

ref.description: Reference of object (This will define subdir automatically and store submited file into it)

filecontent.description: File content (string with file content. An empty file will be created if this parameter is not provided)

overwriteifexists.description: Overwrite file if exists (1 by default)

createdirifnotexists.description: Create subdirectories if the doesn't exists (1 by default)

fk_socpeople.description: Id of thirdparty contact (if source = 'external') or id of user (if souce = 'internal') to link

type_contact.description: Type of contact (code). Must a code found into table llx_c_type_contact. For example: BILLING

close_code.description: Code filled if we classify to 'Paid completely' when payment is not complete (for escompte for example)

close_note.description: Comment defined if we classify to 'Paid' when payment is not complete (for escompte for example)

arrayofamounts.description: Array with id of invoices with amount to pay for each invoice

accepthigherpayment.description: Accept higher payments that it remains to be paid (optional)

entity.description: Entity (when multicompany module is used). '' means 1=first company.

reset.description: Reset token (0=get current token, 1=ask a new token and canceled old token. This means access using current existing API token of user will fails: new token will be required for new access)

fix.description: key value pairs for fixing value types using functions. For example 'id'=>'intval' will make sure all values of the id properties will be converted to integers intval function 'password'=> null will remove all the password entries

separatorChar.description: character that is used to identify sub objects For example when Object::$separatorChar = '.'; array('my.object'=>true) will result in array( 'my'=>array('object'=>true) );

removeEmpty.description: set it to true when empty arrays, blank strings, null values to be automatically removed from response

removeNull.description: set it to true to remove all null values from the result

idwarehouse.description: Warehouse ID to use for stock change (Used only if option STOCK_CALCULATE_ON_VALIDATE_ORDER is on)

incdec.description: 1=Increase/decrease stock of child when parent stock increase/decrease

qty.description: Min quantity for which price is valid

buyprice.description: Purchase price for the quantity min

tva_tx.description: New VAT Rate (For example 8.5. Should not be a string)

delivery_time_days.description: Delay in days for delivery (max). May be '' if not defined.

supplier_reputation.description: Reputation with this product to the defined supplier (empty, FAVORITE, DONOTORDER)

localtaxes_array.description: Array with localtaxes info array('0'=>type1,'1'=>rate1,'2'=>type2,'3'=>rate2) (loaded by getLocalTaxesFromRate(vatrate, 0, ...) function).

multicurrency_buyprice.description: Purchase price for the quantity min in currency

price_impact_is_percent.description: Price impact in percent (true or false)

features.description: List of attributes pairs id_attribute->id_value. Example: array(id_color=>id_Blue, id_size=>id_small, id_option=>id_val_a, ...)

price_impact_is_percent.description: Price impact in percent (true or false)

features.description: List of attributes pairs id_attribute->id_value. Example: array(id_color=>id_Blue, id_size=>id_small, id_option=>id_val_a, ...)

note_private.description: Add this mention at end of private note

qty.description: Qty to add (Use negative value for a stock decrease)

type.description: Optionally specify the type of movement. 0=input (stock increase by a stock transfer), 1=output (stock decrease by a stock transfer), 2=output (stock decrease), 3=input (stock increase).

price.description: To update AWP (Average Weighted Price) when you make a stock increase (qty must be higher then 0).

origin_type.description: Origin type (Element of source object, like 'project', 'inventory', ...)

payment_mode_id.description: Payment mode ID (look it up via REST GET to /setup/dictionary/payment_types)

accountid.description: Bank account ID (look it up via REST GET to /bankaccounts)

chqemetteur.description: Payment issuer (mandatory if payment_mode_id corresponds to 'CHQ'-payment type)

closeopenorder.description: Close order if everything is received

priceLevel.description: Price level to apply to thirdparty
